abstract: Whether or not he won a job with the Devils, the N.H.L. veteran Petr Sykora definitely made an impression.
snippet: Whether or not he won a job with the Devils, the N.H.L. veteran Petr Sykora definitely made an impression.
lead_paragraph: NEWARK -- Petr Sykora, a training camp tryout with a Stanley Cup ring, surveyed the Devils' spacious locker room at Prudential Center. He glanced at some of his younger counterparts. After 935 regular-season and 115 playoff games in the N.H.L., the 35-year-old Sykora offered some perspective.

headline.main: After Giving His All, Sykora Waits for Answer From Devils
